text: @SecPompeo @DeptofDefense @realDonaldTrump From #Xinjiang to #Hongkong, from COVID-19 to unsatisfactory medical kits, from #Huawei to #BeltAndRoad, we will never trust #CommunistChina anymore. We stand with universal values. We are great under your leadership.
